page.title: 19Home Life
page.content: On Wednesday evening someone took Mum to the hospital. Colin and I went to play with Jennifer and Mum carried on to the hospital this was when the man who took Mum had to go and watch the football.The 'phone rang and Alan answered it.We went to pick up Gwyneth from work. We went to the hospital. We entered the hospital Alan went inside they were a long time. Then Alan, Mum and Dad came out and we were surprised because dad had his coat on. We all got into the car and we went to Wingrave. Alan , Gwyneth and Jennifer went back home after they had a cup of coffee and Colin and I went to bed at the same time.
